text: The Red Snowball Tree () is a 1974 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasily Shukshin.Самый мудрый клоун: Лев Дуров умел говорить со зрителем голосом «маленького человека»КАЛИНА КРАСНАЯ (1973) It stars Vasili Shukshin, Lidiya Fedoseyeva-Shukshina, and Ivan Ryzhov. ==Actors== * Vasili Shukshin as Yegor Prokudin, former burglar * Lidiya Fedoseyeva-Shukshina as Lyuba Baykalova, Yegor's bride * Ivan Ryzhov as Fedor Baykalov, Lyuba's father * Maria Skvortsova as Lyuba's mother'' * Aleksei Vanin as Pyotr Baykalov, Lyuba's brother * Maria Vinogradova as Zoya, Pyotr's wife * Euphemia Bystrova as Yegor's mother * Zhanna Prokhorenko as inquisitor * Lev Durov as Sergey Mikhailovich, ofitsiant == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Shukshin
title: The Red Snowball Tree
